title: Language Competency Enhancement Project Through Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Language projects using digital tools based on collaborative learning theory

learning_goals: Learners execute effective communication strategies in three or more team projects through collaborative learning.
Learners complete two or more language projects incorporating peer feedback using digital tools.
Learners improve language proficiency by over 20% through social interaction within a learner community.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
